article: the ugandan peace delegation has handed conditions and offers to the lord 's resistance army -lrb- lra -rrb- rebels to pave the way for the roadmap to peace in the war-torn northern uganda , daily monitor reported on monday .
abstract: ugandan gov t sets terms for rebel peace talks
